column4: i m using ubuntu 7.10 on a intel 965 board. i have enabled compiz but m faxcing some problems with it. video playback is not supported. any suggestions?
run gstreamer-properties , change the video tb option to "no xv"
just a diff way it does video
yah, there's a difference .. if you want details google .. choosing x11 (no vx) is a workaround with compiz and you vid card
